page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT IN NW NEWBURY
page.content: {EMPLOYMENT:}very little possible or available within area.Very often husbands and wives in employment,the latter often engaged in service at oout of area shops. {LOCAL EMPLOYMENT available at {schools,church, {shops,joinery and building {firms,farms,public houses, {conference centre and Watermill {Theatre.} {LARGE EMPLOYERS}of labour outside area to which local inhabitants commute,sometimes by transport provided by the employer,include {A.E.R.A.HARWELL,REEDS PAPER {MILLS,ENGINEERING WORKS,SHOPS & {FACTORIES.} {HOME WORKERS:}A small number of specialist workers operate from home.Some women are {housewives}only. One small area contains many retired people.
